name: shutdown
description: This module add the possibility to Gladys to shutdown and reboot itself, by sending a system command to the OS.
instructionsHTML:
Gladys parameters

Add folowings parameters in gladys :

For my raspberry I use folowing parameters but you can change them :

SHUTDOWN_CMD=sudo shutdown
REBOOT_CMD=sudo reboot

Install the module on gladys

Nom : shutdown Version : 0.0.2 URL git : https://github.com/TanguyNa/gladys-shutdown slug : shutdown

Restart Gladys

Train the brain
In french language : Eteinds-toi / Redémarre In other languages : Shutdown / Reboot
